mapper.select: select b.book_id, b.isbn, b.title, b.author, b.publisher, b.book_description, b.publishing_date, b.state, c.c_id, c.c_name from book_tbl b join classification_tbl c on b.c_id = c.c_id

select b.book_id, b.isbn, b.title, b.author, b.publisher, b.book_description, b.publishing_date, b.state, c.c_id, c.c_name from book_tbl b join classification_tbl c on b.c_id = c.c_id where replace(title, ' ', '') like concat('%',#{title},'%')

select b.book_id, b.isbn, b.title, b.author, b.publisher, b.book_description, b.publishing_date, b.state, c.c_id, c.c_name from book_tbl b join classification_tbl c on b.c_id = c.c_id where isbn = #{isbn}
